name: Aung San Suu Kyi
predecessor2: Thein Nyunt, Soe Maung, Soe Thein, Aung Min, Hla Tun
office3: President of the National League for Democracy
office5: General Secretary of the National League for Democracy
office6: Member of the Burmese House of Representatives, for Kawhmu
office7: Minister of Education |term start = March 30 |term end = April 4
Successor: Myo Thein Gyi  office 8= Minister of Electric and Energy  |term start = March 30 |term end = April 4
alma_mater: University of Delhi, St Hugh's College, Oxford, University of London
awards: Rafto Prize, Sakharov Prize, Nobel Peace Prize, Jawaharlal Nehru Award, International Simón Bolívar Prize, Olof Palme Prize, Bhagwan Mahavir World Peace, Congressional Gold Medal
